title: Walking Miracle: Ryan Shazier
description:
Adam starts off this week's episode with a look-ahead to next week's matchups before welcoming former Steelers all-pro linebacker Ryan Shazier. Adam sits down with Ryan to talk about his new book "Walking Miracle" that details everything he has gone through since the day of his injury back in 2017. Adam wraps up with a travel story from MNF and a recap of his time in Buffalo.
